title: New Client Lag
body: 1. *  Hi, Today is currently April 17 2017 ~ I tried the new client because the old client expires on April 24... The new client was full of lag. I couldn't see anything.. At one point I got punishments from going in queue because the "Ready to play bar" did not show up, or in champion select it did not let me choose then time ran out eventually. How do I this... Is it only me experiencing it??

Love the game but I really feel like it is time to leave.
I have a high end PC, do not have any lag during game, but extreme lag with the new laucher. The animation are not working, it takes a crazy amount of time only to try using the store or even launching a game. Some pages don't show up and some buttons are missing due to lags...
The laucher do look nice, but I can't enjoy anything right now.
Hf and good day

I have solution fot those, who have tried to repair and nothing works. 
You have to change affinity to: 
1.  LeagueClient.exe , 
2.  LeagueClientUx.exe ,
3.  LeagueClientUxRender.exe ,
4.  LeagueClientUxREnder.exe 
and **enable only 2 cores**  _[ ex. CPU1 and CPU2 ]_

https://www.eightforums.com/attachments/tutorials/36501d1391416154-processor-affinity-set-applications-windows-8-a-task_manager_affinity-all.png

Go to options and make sure it closes the client when it start the game

I appreciate you taking the leap into the updated client, though it sucks you've run into some obstacles along the way.  No worries, we can work towards fixing this!  As a first step, I enabled [Low-Spec ](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png)mode on the updated client in case of any performance issues that could be causing some freezing or hiccups.  This option can be found in the client's settings panel via the General section.  

Test it out in a custom game mode, and let me know if you run into any issues.  We'll go from there!
Thank you, but I've tried it and I got kicked from Champion Select and still got a leave buster. My sibling also encountered this problem, maybe it's from our device we're using? It's a MacBook Pro

Thanks for the follow-up!  This may not be a performance issue after all then, if it's happening to two devices within your network.  Instead, this could be a connection issue that's having problems transitioning you to champion select or the game server.  This can result in lag-like symptoms, freezing, and disconnects.  In this case, try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  

Your sibling may need to try the guide as well, but make sure they use the Mac section of that guide.  I hope that helps!
Okay, I'll update you as soon as I try it, Thanks again. ;)
